definition: cause to assemble or enlist in the military, any new member or supporter (as in the armed forces)
details:
verb
- cause to assemble or enlist in the military
= synonyms: raise
- seek to employ
= example: seek to employ
- register formally as a participant or member
= example: register formally as a participant or member
= synonyms: enter, inscribe, enroll, enrol
noun
- any new member or supporter (as in the armed forces)
= synonyms: enlistee
- a recently enlisted soldier
= synonyms: military recruit
